Chapter 19: The Aggregates, Part One. At one time the Blessed One was dwelling in ÅšrÄvastÄ«, in the Jeta Grove, in the AnÄthapiá¹‡á¸ada Park.

There are five kinds of aggregates.
What are the five?
Namely, the form aggregate, the feeling aggregate, the perception aggregate, the formation aggregate, and the consciousness aggregate. These are called the five aggregates.
What is the form aggregate?
All that is form, all of it is the four great elements and that which is derived from the four great elements. This is called the form aggregate.
What is the feeling aggregate?
All that is feeling, being felt, the nature of feeling, and what is included in feeling. This is called the feeling aggregate.
There are also two kinds of feelings called the aggregate of feeling, namely, bodily feelings and mental feelings.
What are bodily feelings?
Bodily feelings are those associated with the five consciousnesses, up to and including feelings that are included in the aggregate of feeling.
What are mental feelings?
Mental feelings are those associated with mental consciousness, up to and including feelings that are included in the aggregate of feeling.
There are also two kinds of feelings called the aggregate of feeling, namely, feelings with flavor and feelings without flavor.
What are feelings with flavor?
Feelings with flavor are those associated with contaminated attention, up to and including feelings that are included in the aggregate of feeling.
What are feelings without flavor?
Feelings without flavor are those associated with uncontaminated attention, up to and including feelings that are included in the aggregate of feeling.

There is an opinion that feelings associated with attention in the desire realm are called feelings with flavor, and feelings associated with attention in the form and formless realms are called feelings without flavor.
In this context, feeling associated with contaminated attention is called feeling with taste, and feeling associated with uncontaminated attention is called feeling without taste.

Just as there is feeling with taste and feeling without taste, so too there is feeling that falls into [the cycle of] birth and death and feeling that does not fall into [the cycle of] birth and death, feeling that is the basis for indulgence and feeling that is the basis for renunciation, feeling that accords with the fetters and feeling that does not accord with the fetters, feeling that accords with grasping and feeling that does not accord with grasping, feeling that accords with the bonds and feeling that does not accord with the bonds, and feeling that is worldly and feeling that is supramundane.
There are also three kinds of feelings called the aggregate of feeling, namely, pleasant feeling, painful feeling, and neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling.
What is pleasant feeling?
It refers to bodily pleasure and mental pleasure born from contact with pleasant objects, which is feeling and is included in feeling. This is called pleasant feeling.

Moreover, cultivating the first, second, and third concentrations, the mental pleasure born from contact with pleasant objects that accords with pleasant feeling, which is feeling and is included in feeling, is called pleasant feeling.
What is painful feeling?
That is to say, the bodily suffering and mental suffering produced by painful contact, the unequal feelings included in feeling, are called painful feeling.
What is neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling?

That is to say, the bodily equanimity and mental equanimity produced by contact that is neither-painful-nor-pleasant, the neither-equal-nor-unequal feelings included in feeling, are called neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling.

Furthermore, the mental equanimity produced by contact that is neither-painful-nor-pleasant in the cultivation of the preliminary concentration, the intermediate concentration, the fourth concentration, and the formless concentrations, the neither-equal-nor-unequal feelings included in feeling, are called neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling.
There are also four kinds of feelings called the aggregate of feeling, namely, feelings of the desire realm, feelings of the form realm, feelings of the formless realm, and unattached feelings.
What are feelings of the desire realm?
That is to say, the various feelings associated with attention of the desire realm, up to those included in feeling, are called feelings of the desire realm.
What are feelings of the form realm?
It is said that the feelings associated with the volition of the form realm, up to the feelings included in the aggregates, are called the feelings of the form realm.
What are the feelings of the formless realm?
It is said that the feelings associated with the volition of the formless realm, up to the feelings included in the aggregates, are called the feelings of the formless realm.
What are the feelings that are not bound to any realm?
It is said that the feelings associated with the volition of the uncontaminated, up to the feelings included in the aggregates, are called the feelings that are not bound to any realm.
